name: Awair CSV Download Example
description: A barebones CSV exporter for Awair data using Heroku and Flask

APP_NAME.description: This should be the same as the 'App name' above. It is the subdomain in the app URL (*.heroku.com) where * is the APP_NAME

APP_SECRET_KEY.description: A unique, randomly generated secret key to create a secure session cookie for your app.

CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID can be found in the Awair Developer Console under your app details.

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret can be found in the Awair Developer Console under your app details.
